caller_intent: The caller, representing Mister Cooper, requested renewal information for a Hazad Fire Policy (initially misstated as a Homeowners Policy).
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policy type (Hazad Fire Policy) and clarified the request.
Asked caller to provide their name for record-keeping (Ashley PS).
Provided the support email address: support@myallianceinsurance.com.
Instructed caller to send a request to upload the declaration page to the website.
knowledge_required: Document upload process for policy renewals
summary: A Mister Cooper representative requested renewal information for a Hazad Fire Policy. The agent clarified the policy type, verified the caller's identity, and directed them to send a request via the support email to upload the declaration page. The call concluded with the customer agreeing to proceed.
